original: @76a * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //üîΩgang dag gza' rnams kyis zin pa las grol bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas /

translated: Homage to the glorious VajravidƒÅra·πáa.

original: dkyil 'khor snga ma ltar bris la /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor snga ma ltar bris la /
translated: The practitioner who is bound by samaya and wishes to be freed from being seized by the planets should draw the ma·πá·∏çala as before.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogs su chu dang khrag dang 'o ma bsres pas snod zangs la sogs pa bkang la /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogs su chu dang khrag dang 'o ma bsres pas snod zangs la sogs pa bkang la /
translated: In the east of the ma·πá·∏çala, fill a copper vessel, and so on, with water, blood, and milk mixed together.

original: gza' gang gis zin pa'i gzugs bag zan la zhi dkar sa'i phye mas bsres pa la khru gang pa tshon sna tshogs pas ri mo dang / thig ler byas la gzhag go ;
analyzed: gza' gang gis zin pa'i gzugs bag zan la zhi dkar sa'i phye mas bsres pa la khru gang pa tshon sna tshogs pas ri mo dang / thig ler byas la gzhag go ;
translated: Place the effigy of the one seized by the planet, made of rice flour mixed with white sugar, one cubit in size, with various colors, and with dots, in the ma·πá·∏çala.

original: / de'i lus rnams ltas ngan sna tshogs pa'i spu dang / stag gzig gi ras dang / smyug ma gtsang ma la gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan kyang phyar ro //
analyzed: / de'i lus rnams ltas ngan sna tshogs pa'i spu dang / stag gzig gi ras dang / smyug ma gtsang ma la gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan kyang phyar ro //
translated: On his body, place various inauspicious hairs, tiger skins, and pure bamboo for the parasol, victory banner, and flag.

original: de nas gzugs de chu'i steng du khri byas la dar dmar po'i yol ba bres la gzhag go //
analyzed: de nas gzugs de chu'i steng du khri byas la dar dmar po'i yol ba bres la gzhag go //
translated: Then, having made a throne on the water, place the effigy there, covered with a red silk curtain.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs mtshams rnams su gtor ma gtsang ma brgyad /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs mtshams rnams su gtor ma gtsang ma brgyad /
translated: In the cardinal and intermediate directions of the ma·πá·∏çala, set out eight pure bali offerings

original: spos dang mar me dang bshos dang ldan pa bsham mo //
analyzed: spos dang mar me dang bshos dang ldan pa bsham mo //
translated: with incense, lamps, and cakes.

original: stag pa'am shug pa khru gang ba cig la khram nyi shu rtsa gcig btod la /
analyzed: stag pa'am shug pa khru gang ba cig la khram nyi shu rtsa gcig btod la /
translated: On a stick of teak or juniper, one cubit in length, make twenty-one notches,

original: rma bya'i sgro dang bal tshon dang / dar tshon lnga yis byas pas gzas zin pa'i lus mgo mjug bya ba ste ;
analyzed: rma bya'i sgro dang bal tshon dang / dar tshon lnga yis byas pas gzas zin pa'i lus mgo mjug bya ba ste ;
translated: and with peacock feathers, cotton thread, and the five-colored silk thread, perform the rite of the head to foot of the one seized by a planet.

original: chu dang gzugs la bstim mo //
analyzed: chu dang gzugs la bstim mo //
translated: Dissolve into the water and the form.

original: sngags pa gtsang sbra ldan pas dmar po'i gos gyon /
analyzed: sngags pa gtsang sbra ldan pas dmar po'i gos gyon /
translated: The pure mantra practitioner wears red clothing,

original: mgo la dmar po'i thod bcings la /
analyzed: mgo la dmar po'i thod bcings la /
translated: binds a red skull on the head,

original: me long lnga btsugs la gza' gang gis zin pa'i snying po la 'bum phrag gcig khram shing la btab la khram phyis byad bkrol shod gtor zhes brjod cing nad pa'i lus la gza'i sgo'i ngos su bya ste /

translated: and places five mirrors. Having recited the essence mantra of the planet that has seized [the patient] one hundred thousand times, he should strike the patient‚Äôs body with the notched stick, saying, ‚ÄúI release the seal of the planet.‚Äù

original: gzugs la bstim /
analyzed: gzugs la bstim /

original: gtor ma char gyin gza' la mchod pa dang bstod pa bya /
analyzed: gtor ma char gyin gza' la mchod pa dang bstod pa bya /
translated: While giving the bali offering, make offerings and praises to the planets.

original: lhag ma bdun po'i snying po la stong phrag re chu la bzlas shing /
analyzed: lhag ma bdun po'i snying po la stong phrag re chu la bzlas shing /
translated: Recite the essence mantra of the remaining seven [planets] one thousand times each over water.

original: gzas zin pa'i lus la bya ba bo //üîΩdbung shig / tshogs khye /
analyzed: gzas zin pa'i lus la bya ba bo // dbung shig / tshogs khye /
translated: When the afflicted person is seized,üîΩ[recite] ‚ÄúDestroy the army!üîΩTake the assembly!üîΩCrush the pride!

original: ngar rtul / dmag @76b sod ;
analyzed: ngar rtul / dmag @76b sod ;
translated: Kill the army!‚Äù

original: ces brjod cing brab po //
analyzed: ces brjod cing brab po //
translated: and strike [the afflicted person].

original: de nas 'bru mar dang rtsi mar la sogs pa rnyed tshad la snying po rgyas bsdus gang yang rung ba brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te /
analyzed: de nas 'bru mar dang rtsi mar la sogs pa rnyed tshad la snying po rgyas bsdus gang yang rung ba brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te /
translated: Then, recite the extensive or concise essence mantra one hundred and eight times over all the sesame oil, tree resin, and so forth that have been collected.

analyzed: nad pa'i lus mgo mjug tu bsku mnye bya'o //

translated: If the afflicted person is not freed after one [session], do two, three, or seven [sessions].

original: gzas zin pa las mi grol mi srid do //üîΩde nas chu rungs su bcas pa de rgya mtsho chen po'i gling ngam /
analyzed: gzas zin pa las mi grol mi srid do // de nas chu rungs su bcas pa de rgya mtsho chen po'i gling ngam /

original: ri brgyad 'dus pa'i rtse mo la pi wang la sogs pa'i sgra sna tshogs dang ldan pas bskyal lo //
analyzed: ri brgyad 'dus pa'i rtse mo la pi wang la sogs pa'i sgra sna tshogs dang ldan pas bskyal lo //
translated: Then, the afflicted person, who has been confined in water, should be escorted to an island in the great ocean or to the peak where eight mountains converge, with various sounds of vƒ´·πáƒÅs, and so forth.

original: gtor ma brgyad po yang phyogs mtshams ma nor bar gtang /
analyzed: gtor ma brgyad po yang phyogs mtshams ma nor bar gtang /

original: de ltar cho ga rdzogs par byas nas /
analyzed: de ltar cho ga rdzogs par byas nas /

original: gzas zin pa la yang gong gi gza' brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur na /
analyzed: gzas zin pa la yang gong gi gza' brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur na /
